text: geudaega jeonsie geudeulgaunde seo yebaeleul deulil ttae ilbuneun mugi leul soyuhanchae jeog-eul hyanghayeo gyeong-gyeto log hago geu ilbuga yebaeleul machyeoss-eul ttae daleun ilbuleul geudeul-ui wichilo o gehayeo geudaeui humieseo yebae ha dolog hamyeo mugileul soyuhago gyeong-gye leul hadolog hala bulsinjadeul-eun neohui ga mugiwa jangbie soholhi hagileul balamae neohuileul ilgyeog-e gong-gyeoghagoja ham-ila geuleona biga ogeona mom-i apeulttaeneun mugileul soyuhaji aniha yeodo joeag-i anijiman moduga neo hui jasindeul-eul wihae gyeong-gyehala sillo hananim-eun bulsinjadeul-eul wihae gotongseu leoun beol-eul junbihasyeossnola
